value.title: StarCraft 2: Maru's INCREDIBLE Terran Mech! (Reynor vs Maru)
value.excerpt: Top level game of professional StarCraft 2 between Maru (Terran) and Reynor (Zerg). Reynor decides to go for a Brood Lord timing attack versus Maru's passive Terran Mech style. While most players would just lose the game rigth then and there, Maru somehow manages to stabilize and counter attack.  Support

value.title: StarCraft 2: uThermal's SUPER SLOW Terran Push!
value.excerpt: Stargazers managed to take fourth place at the most recent StarCraft 2 Map Contest (TLMC 16). There's a good chance that this map will be used in future SC2 tournaments. value.title: StarCraft 2: PROFESSIONAL 2v2?! (Maru & sOs vs MaxPax & souL)
value.excerpt: The standard competitive mode in StarCraft 2 is 1v1. However the OlimoLeague recently put on an event where they invited three teams of progamers to face off in a 2v2 (2 vs 2) event. In this video I cast a best-of-5 between Maru and sOs on one team, and MaxPax and souL on the other.  OlimoLeague on Patreon:
